s: Neosho, Missouri based Marco Group Inc. was founded by Rick and Richard Davidson in 1997 and began operations as a wood supplier to Sunbeam Corporation. Over the years, Marco Group Inc. has expanded into a variety of categories and markets and continues to grow.
